page.title: 01GENERAL INFORMATION
page.content: The area is mostly farm land through which run the A74{main road}from Carlisle to Glasgow,and the main west coast railwayline from Scotland to London Most of the{population}lives in the village of Eaglesfield,once noted for its drapery businesses.These are now all closed and most of the inhabitants work outside the area.A large proportion of the population are elderly Eaglesfield is reputedly the longest village in south Scotland,the houses being situated along each side of the only street for a full mile. There is a church,primary{school } with 54 children,post office,public house and a few small businesses in the village and{farming}in the surrounding area.
